Function Documentation

template<typename MatrixType >
void cusp::gallery::poisson5pt ( MatrixType &  matrix,
size_t  m,
size_t  n 
) [inline]

poisson5pt: Create a matrix representing a Poisson problem discretized on an m by n grid with the standard 5-point finite-difference stencil.

Parameters:
matrix output
m number of grid rows
n number of grid columns
Template Parameters:
MatrixType matrix container
 #include <cusp/gallery/poisson.h>
 #include <cusp/coo_matrix.h>
 #include <cusp/print.h>
 
 int main(void)
 {
     cusp::coo_matrix<int, float, cusp::device_memory> A;
     
     // create a matrix for a Poisson problem on a 4x4 grid
     cusp::gallery::poisson5pt(A, 4, 4);
 
     // print matrix
     cusp::print(A);
 
     return 0;
 }
